Thomas William "Bill" Hader (born June 7, 1978 in Tulsa, Oklahoma) is an American comedian, actor, voice actor, producer, director and writer.
He is best known for his roles in "Saturday Night Live", "Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs", "Superbad", "Hot Rod", "Tropic Thunder", "Adventureland", "Paul", "Forgetting Sarah Marshall", ', "Inside Out", ', "The BFG" and as adult Richie Tozier in "It – Chapter Two".
He is married to Maggie Carey in 2006 and they had 3 children. Harder and Carey separated in 2017, Hader later filed for divorce several months later in December 2017. The divorce was finalized in 2018.
